programme.title: Go Goa Gone
programme.desc: Three slackers attend a rave party on a secluded island in Goa, only to discover it's infested with zombies. With help from a Russian mafioso who claims to be a zombie hunter, they must escape alive in this hilarious genre-bending film.

programme.title: Double Dhamaal
programme.desc: Directed by Indra Kumar, this follow-up to Dhamaal reunites the original gang Ritesh Deshmukh, Arshad Warsi, Aashish Chaudhary, and Javed Jaffrey as they attempt to double-cross a slick businessman (Sanjay Dutt). With new additions Kangana Ranaut and Mallika Sherawat, the film delivers over-the-top antics and comedic twists.

programme.title: Parmanu - The Story of Pokhran
programme.desc: Based on true events, Parmanu – The Story of Pokhran follows the journey of a dedicated IAS officer, Ashwat Raina, who leads a top-secret mission to conduct India’s first underground nuclear tests in 1998 at Pokhran, Rajasthan. Battling political opposition, espionage threats, and tight deadlines, the team works against all odds to place India on the world’s nuclear map. The film is a patriotic thriller about courage, strategy, and national honor.

programme.title: Double Dhamaal
programme.desc: Directed by Indra Kumar, this follow-up to Dhamaal reunites the original gang Ritesh Deshmukh, Arshad Warsi, Aashish Chaudhary, and Javed Jaffrey as they attempt to double-cross a slick businessman (Sanjay Dutt). With new additions Kangana Ranaut and Mallika Sherawat, the film delivers over-the-top antics and comedic twists.

programme.title: Parmanu - The Story of Pokhran
programme.desc: Based on true events, Parmanu – The Story of Pokhran follows the journey of a dedicated IAS officer, Ashwat Raina, who leads a top-secret mission to conduct India’s first underground nuclear tests in 1998 at Pokhran, Rajasthan. Battling political opposition, espionage threats, and tight deadlines, the team works against all odds to place India on the world’s nuclear map. The film is a patriotic thriller about courage, strategy, and national honor.

programme.title: Go Goa Gone
programme.desc: Three slackers attend a rave party on a secluded island in Goa, only to discover it's infested with zombies. With help from a Russian mafioso who claims to be a zombie hunter, they must escape alive in this hilarious genre-bending film.

programme.title: Double Dhamaal
programme.desc: Directed by Indra Kumar, this follow-up to Dhamaal reunites the original gang Ritesh Deshmukh, Arshad Warsi, Aashish Chaudhary, and Javed Jaffrey as they attempt to double-cross a slick businessman (Sanjay Dutt). With new additions Kangana Ranaut and Mallika Sherawat, the film delivers over-the-top antics and comedic twists.

programme.title: City Lights
programme.desc: CityLights is a poignant drama that tells the story of Deepak Singh (Rajkummar Rao), a former army man who migrates to Mumbai with his wife and child after losing everything in Rajasthan. Hoping for a better future, he is instead confronted with harsh urban realities—poverty, betrayal, and exploitation. Directed by Hansal Mehta, the film is a deeply emotional exploration of migration, survival, and the human cost of urban dreams. It is a remake of the acclaimed British film Metro Manila.

programme.title: Mission Majnu
programme.desc: Set against the backdrop of the Indo-Pakistani War of 1971, the film follows Amandeep Singh, a RAW agent operating undercover in Pakistan. As he uncovers Pakistan's nuclear ambitions, he must navigate personal and professional challenges to complete his mission.
